attributes.action: review universal job match website.Fix log in errors or renew system
attributes.additional_details: Currently there are many concerns with the current universal job match website. Login problems are frequent, Area locations come up incorrect,  there seems to be no help desk available when log trying to log in. Change of log in from memorable numbers to a name needs to be made also the location finder & full time part time needs correcting. the whole website as a whole has many problems that need fixing.
